Role('Siesta.Util.Role.CanParseOs', {

    methods : {

        parseOS : function (platform) {
            if (/Win/i.test(platform)) return "Windows"

            if (/Mac/.test(platform) || /darwin/i.test(platform)) return "MacOS"

            if (/Linux/i.test(platform)) return "Linux"

            return "unknown"
        }
    }
});
